text: Messiah (Jesu) mwana waMariya, akange asiri chimwe chinhu kunze kwemutumwa; uye vatumwa vazhinji vakadarika mushure make. Mai vake (Mariya) vainge vari munhu hwechokwadi (vaitenda mumashoko aAllah nemumaGwaro avo). Vose vaidya chikafu (semadyiro anoita vamwe vanhu, asi Allah havadyi chikafu). Tarisai nzira yatinovatsanangurira nayo mirairo yedu; asi tarisai kuti vanorasika sei kubva muchokwadi
